text: Is it possible that suicide is an evolutionary advantage to a species When members of a social species have a specific task they need to do to keep the group alive  I imagine they feel a deep inclusiveness  Whereas those of us who have no purpose are merely drains of resources and generally feel very alone  Perhaps loneliness  the desire to die  and committing suicide when not useful helps keep the useful members of a population alive and healthy  Then they can reproduce others who will be motivated to keep the group alive I dunno  I just want out and am trying to figure out why  Self imposed isolation is the worst  but I just don t have the energy to keep up with others  Perhaps we aren t all fit for existence

text: Tried killing myself after my mom found out I failed a subject in college  Experiencing the feeling of  close to dying I m a pre med student and my mom found out I failed chemistry at one of the most privileged universities in my country  I got straight As and Bs in my other classes  but why did I fail chemistry  Because I m emotionally unstable I was depressed as shit that day so I just passed out on my bed and didn t bother to study I ruined my parents expectations  My goal was to graduate with Honors and now I m just that misunderstood defective sibling who s always behind the shadow of their successful  in my case  sister who did graduate with honors and  has a scholarship in Korea mastering industrial engineering Yesterday I felt I almost experienced death itself  After crying my eyes out feelings of deception and extreme hunger and dehydration  I turned of all the lights in my room  no source of light could be seen  Grabbed both my hands and began chocking myself as hard as I could slowing the blood flow of my necks veins as much as I could while feeling my face getting hot and my face muscles becoming numb and suddenly I started hearing my synchronized heartbeats ringing loudly though my ears feeling like my face was about to explode while the noises in the exterior around me began fading slowly   It was scary but exciting at the same time  I realized my door wasn t locked so I stopped  And after opening my eyes I feel a comforting peaceful feeling I rarely had ever felt of unconsciousness  something I had only felt before medical procedures microseconds after anesthesia  I felt like I was already dead inside  but physically alive Going to end this soon  A shotgun to the heart hopefully TL DR  tried killing my self and had a close to death experience
summary: Tried killing herself after her mom found out she failed a subject in college. She was depressed and didn't bother to study. She wanted to graduate with Honors. Her sister graduated with honors and has a scholarship in Korea mastering industrial engineering.
